about_the_game:
It's a sandbox where you slay hordes of monster in the most spectacular way to get valuable loot.

  • Play your way.
    Total freedom in achieving your goals.

  • Only Endgame Matters.
    You can start playing the game the moment you login to it. There will not be any mandatory chores to do before you will be able to start doing what you want. No campaign, no leveling to max level etc... just pure gameplay.

  • Player driven economy.
    There are countless items, consumables, materials and cosmetics to find which all can be traded to other players. You can participate in any part of economy chain and become supplier, craftsmen, trader or simple consumer.

  • Deep character customization.
    Open class system where you can build your character exactly as you want. You can craft you own gear with game changing abilities and create your own spells.

  • Fast pased combat.
    You will kill hordes of monsters with incredible speed.

  • No timegating and FOMO.
    Timegating and FOMO are evil and we don't wanna it in our game.

name: The Endgame

short_description: True sandbox hack'n'slash entirely focused on endgame. Slay hordes of monsters in the most spectacular way and with extreme speed. Collect countless items, materials or cosmetics and take part in living economy.
